title: Sunset Wyvern
desc: Watercolor painting of a peacock bass with a fly-fishing fly in it's mouth on a taught flyline half submerged swimming in the water.

title: Peacock Bass
desc: Watercolor painting of a peacock bass with a fly-fishing fly in it's mouth on a taught flyline half submerged swimming in the water.

title: Year of the Snake
desc: Digital painting of a white snake wearing a crown and adorned with gold chains draped over the hilt of a sword pointing downward.

title: Giant Panda
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a panda sleeping on a crescent moon with 4 swords hanging below them.

title: Philippine Eagle
desc: Watercolor portrait of a Philippine Eagle looking over its shoulder.

title: Mountain Gazelle
desc: Micron pen and watercolor portrait of a Mountain Gazelle with a sunny sky in the background.

title: Sea Serpent Dreams of Flying
desc: Micron pen and watercolor scene of a sea dragon, inspired by the Galapagos marine iguana, climbing a rock spire that is being struck by lightning in a stormy sea and sky.

title: Pernambuco Pygmy-owl
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a Pernambuco Pygmy-owl on a light branch with 8 more branches in the background and a night sky.

title: How We Dance
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of two White-crowned Hornbills flying and arguing with 5 white branches in the background over a pink and gray sky.

title: Raven Queen
desc: Digital portrait of the Raven Queen from A Practical Guide to Sorcery, holding feathers with feathers falling around her and her shadow shows a raven demon. Below her knees she dissolves into feathers.

title: Sunshine
desc: Linocut print of a American Goldfinch sitting on a sunflower with a sun in a blue sky behind it.

title: Jellyfish
desc: Linocut and gelli plate prints of jellyfish, some over abstract watercolor backgrounds.

title: Bitter Dreams
desc: Linocut and gelli plate prints of jellyfish and birds, some over abstract watercolor backgrounds, conveying the idea of dreams and how when reached they sometimes aren't what they were anticipated to be.

title: Two of Pentacles
desc: watercolor and ink painting crow flying holding a white ribbon with two jingle bells over a red, orange, and yellow background.

title: Salmon Run
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a bear carrying off a fish from a fish filled stream in Alaska with 9 sea stars. In the background is a misty forest.

title: Eight of Cups
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a Japanese River Otter on a fallen log with shelf fungi on it over a river.

title: Dhole Party
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of three dholes playing near a stream with 3 pools of water with a dry grassy field behind them.

title: Pancakes with Henry
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a boy sitting on a kitchen chair eating pancakes with a multi-eyed, multi-mouthed, tentacled dark purple eldritch horror lit by a staff with a lantern on it.

title: Himalayan Brown Bear
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a Himalayan Brown Bear sitting on a pile of rocks with the sunset in the background.

title: Indian Bison
desc: Portrait of the left half of an Indian Bison's face in watercolor.

title: Forest Owlet
desc: A blond woman in a white dress steps over the root of a large tree deep in the forest as light filters through the leaves. In one hand is a shepherds crook, the other arm is lifted and an owlet is perched on it looking at her. Done in micron pen and watercolor.

title: Red Squirrel
desc: A red squirrel with a fluffy tail looks up at the viewer, shocked.

title: Panay Monitor
desc: Line art of a panay monitor lizard sitting on a branch facing left staring at the viewer.

title: Yellow-billed Loon
desc: A loon diving into a school of small fish holding a necklace in its beak with sand dollars on the sea floor.

title: Lion’s Mane Jellyfish
desc: Watercolor painting of a lion's mane jellyfish with an abstract blue splatter background.

title: Lamplugh Glacier
desc: Sme-abstract watercolor painting of the texture of the lamplugh glacier in Alaska.

title: Fog at Sea
desc: The sea fades into the sky with no defined horizon line, the only thing visible is a fuzzy silhouette of a bird flying in the distance.

title: Alaska Sunset
desc: Watercolor painting of sunset over the ocean in Alaska with several islands sillhoutted in black.

title: Rainbow Inkblot Cat
desc: Watercolor splatters make a rainbow heart shape with a black cat silhouette grooming itself in the middle.

title: Amelia
desc: Brown haired woman weaing black pants, brown shoes, steel blue shirt, and a disintegrating cloak sitting on a stoop of a worn building with a chicken wearing a blue bandana coming out of the door. On the door is a sign saying 'Bucky's Out of this World Restaurant'.

title: Seven of Wands
desc: Seven burnished poles with roots growing and holding them up with fire at the base and the night sky and stars behind. On the central pole, a hrothgar (a cat person from FFXIV) pole dances in an open button up tee shirt and jean shorts.

title: Seven of Cups
desc: Puddingway, a loporrit from FInal Fantasy 14, sits reading a recipe book with bowls and cups of pudding around him while thinking of pudding.

title: Sad Mushroom
desc: A sad mushroom with a red cap sits with their legs kicked up and shining eyes as though they're about to cry. Inspired by the baby bun mini from Final Fantasy 14.

title: Cosmos
desc: Watercolor painting of a white-throated magpie jay sitting on a gold crescent holding a golden orb with an abstract pink, gold, and black background with a shining gold circle.

title: Sylver Sezari
desc: Necromancer Sylver Sezari from Sylver Seeker in the foreground with his hand on the hood of his cloak and a string of bones in his other hand. In the background are glowing yellow eyes, bones, and wyvern and wolf shades.

title: Cyan Jellyfish
desc: Jellyfish with frilly tendrils painted in light blues and some yellow with blue paint splatters.

title: Finnish Forest Reindeer
desc: Digital art of a druid reclining wearing a a reindeer skull mask with glowing red butterflies around him.

title: Long-whiskered Owlet
desc: Micron pen drawing of an owlet with the night sky behind it.

title: Reeve’s Pheasant
desc: Blue, purple and teal abstract background with a Reeve's Pheasant inspired Luan mythological bird flying over it carying a black ribbon with a jingle bell.

title: Two-spot Ladybug
desc: Watercolor in red, yellow, blue, and black of a large two-spot ladybug made up of slightly abstract drips of paint, with the antenna and nead giving it distinct ladybug form.

title: Irimote cat
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of an irimote cat carrying a lizard looking backwards at the viewer over it's shoulder.

title: Tarquin
desc: Micron pen and watercolor of a miqo'te white mage casting a blood lily, FFXIV fan art.

title: Almost Rabbits, II
desc: Woodblock print of a pair of jackalopes looking up at the full moon next to a leafless tree, the moon has a silhouette of a rabbit making medicine in it.

title: Tiny Dragon
desc: Micron pen drawing on brown paper of a tiny wingless dragon crouched on a teaspoon.

title: Amir Leopard
desc: Micron pen portrait of an amir leopard.

title: Sacred Blue Lily of the Nile
desc: Black ink and blue and yellow watercolor paining of a waterlily and two lily pads.

title: White-spotted Char
desc: Micron pen and ink of a group of White-spotted Char swimming.

title: Long-snouted Seahorse
desc: Micron pen drawing of a Long-snouted Seahorse with a giant gold in water drop behind it.

title: Four-horned Chameleon
desc: micron pen drawing of a Four-horned Chameleon sitting in a leafy plant.

title: Eld's Deer
desc: Micron pen drawing of an eld's deer running on water with a wave following it.

title: Grumpy Cat
desc: Watercolor portrait of grumpy cat, grumpy cat fan art.

title: Stalking but Unaware
desc: watercolor painting of an angler fish hunting a minnow about to get eaten by an octopus, portraying the Chinese proverb: A mantis stalking a cicada is unaware of an oriole behind.

title: Almost Rabbits, Watercolor
desc: Watercolor of a pair of jackalopes looking up at the full moon next to a leafless tree, the moon has a silhouette of a rabbit making medicine in it.

title: Adding Wings to a Tiger
desc: watercolor painting of of a winged tiger landing on a hill and in it's wings is a starry sky.

title: Alpha and Omega
desc: micron pen and watercolor on brown paper of Alpha, the simulated chocobo, and a silhouette of omega with the galaxy in it, FFXIV fan art

title: Ghost
desc: ink and white pen painting of a jellyfish

title: Playing Crow
desc: Black and gold ink painting of a crow plaing in willow branches.

title: Finnley's Treasure
desc: Woodblock print of a jindo standing with a blue sky with happy clouds and dragon flies behind him

title: Goji Pet Portrait
desc: watercolor and micron pen full body pet portrait of a white jindo shiba inu mix lying on a purple rug and blanket
